channel.title: Yacc.Io on Yacc.io
channel.description: Recent content in Yacc.Io on Yacc.io

item.title: Introduction
item.description:
Welcome to the Yacc.io blog, we hope you will enjoy your time here.

Yacc.io is a small software development and consultancy company based in Copenhagen Denmark. We have solved a large variety of software development tasks and have delivered a multitude of software systems to our customers. With technologies ranging from enterprise to open source solutions.

This blog will be dedicated to discuss software engineering and computer science topics that we find interesting. We will also occasionally announce Yacc.io related news. We will strive to release at least one post every month, so stay tuned!
